name: KYO-MARU
tag_list: art, craft, japanese, gallery, social-platform, online-collection
overview:
KYO-MARU Inc. is an online gallery that is a hybrid of an eCommerce website and social media. A unique feature offered by this gallery is the ability to present artwork on its online collections space. It can be used by individual collectors to purchase and display their art on the internet, but also has the potential to be used by corporations as a strategy to gain attention through presenting remarkable artwork on the company’s collection area.

The company was founded in early 2010 and is based in Chiba, Japan.
